MS MCQs

    Monitor and manage your coffee machine with Azure IoT Central

    »

    1. Which statement best describes the information in a device template?

      The hardware specification of a device connected to your application.

      The data and commands a device can exchange with your application.

      The over-the-wire protocol used to communicate with a device.


    2. True or false: you must have a physical device to test your IoT Central application.

      True

      False


    3. Suppose you have five physical devices communicating with IoT Central. How many connection strings would you have?

      One: the connection string is shared by all connected devices.

      Two: one in active use and one backup in case the primary is compromised.

      Five: every device needs a unique connection string.
